column4: whenever i restart my pc i get this msg " there is difference between boot sector and its back up" is this normal?
whenever i restart my pc i get this msg " there is difference between boot sector and its back up" is this normal?
That message may be related to    https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/grub-installer/+bug/47382
Or rerunning   grub-install   may correct the message.
